Text.Value: *You and Gale find it hard enough to tolerate each other as it is. It seems unlikely that a revelation like this will do anything but widen the gulf between you.*
Leave it be for now.
And gods forbid it should be you who's kept in the dark.

EditorData.NodeContext: Sarcastic - Gale's been kept in the dar (in the lied to sense) by Astarion until now

Text.Value: Debatable. But our common goals remain common, so I see no point in depriving each other of an ally.
Trust in Gale. Tell him the truth about yourself. Ask for acceptance.
*Your bond with Gale grows stronger every day. This kind of honesty might build a new level of trust between you. So long as you tell him in the right way...*
And if he does, he'll not find you alone.

EditorData.NodeContext: Promising to stand by Astarion if his master pursues him

Text.Value: A vampire and a fugitive? You've got everything going for you, haven't you?

EditorData.NodeContext: Sarcastic, qith a sigh - at this point, unfazed by anything

Text.Value: For now, let's consider that particular matter settled. Was that the only thing on your mind?
I'd have appreciated your honesty a lot more had it been offered prior to us setting off on this adventure together.

EditorData.logicalname: Sets NEGATIVE REACTION LOW APPROVAL DECREASE

Text.Value: My neck's puncture-free, I've not experienced any overwhelming desire to exsanguinate my nearest and dearest... I can only conclude there's no harm done.

EditorData.NodeContext: Neutral, running through a checklist - might have reacted positively or negatively prior to this

Text.Value: Be blunt. Tell Gale the truth. Hope your honesty is enough.
A vampire spawn? I'd hazard that's an attribute you're well justified in keeping to yourself. I'm glad you felt you could trust me with it.
*The bond you share with Gale is remarkable, considering the short time you've known each other. Risk honesty, and you're almost certain he'll accept you as you are.*
Come now - I can see there's something on your mind.

EditorData.NodeContext: Was expecting a question, reacting to player looking thoughtful

Text.Value: But what does this revelation of yours mean for us going forward?
I knew you had some dark secret to hide, but a vampire spawn? It wouldn't have been my first guess, I'll put it that way.
Is that so? Well let's hope that continues to be the case. There's no guarantee our cure will be found lurking in the darkness, after all.
Hmm. Well, I appreciate your honesty. If you trust me enough to confess this, in spite of our disagreements, that's no small thing.
It makes the removal of my tadpole more complicated. That's the reason I can walk in the sun.
Well, I suppose that explains why we don't often see eye-to-eye. Or tooth-to-fang, as is apparently the case.
I'm a vampire spawn.
I have a Master. He may come looking for me...
It doesn't change anything. I'm still the same loveable rogue I always was.
Now with added bite.

EditorData.NodeContext: Sense of an eyebrow raised at the idea this hasn't changed anything

Synopsis: Gale's default dialog that triggers whenever you speak to Gale in the game world. Covers a variety of topics that mostly react to Gale-related events that took place.
